title: Aliquot
description: Pertaining to a portion (volume or weight) of the whole.

cimac_aliquot_id.description: Aliquot identifier assigned by the CIMAC-CIDC Network. Example: CIMAC-12453.

units.description: Unit of each sample. Example: ml.

pbmc_aliquoted.description: Site or biobank provides the final number of PBMCs per vial that were frozen.

pbmc_recovered.description: Receiving site determines number fo PBMCs per vial recovered upon receipt.

material_used.description: Receiving site indicates how much material was used for assay purposes.

material_remaining.description: Receiving site indicates how much material remains after assay use.

sample_source.description: Indicates the specimen source of the sample shipped. Example: Na Heparin blood draw aliquots (2 of three), FFPE block #52

sample_quality_status.description: Final status of sample after QC and pathology review.

sample_replacement.description: Status of sample if replacement is/was requested.

sample_status.description: Status of sample used for other assay, exhausted, destroyed, or returned.

material_extracted.description: The type of biological material that was extracted from this sample.

extracted_concentration.description: The concentration of biological material that was extracted from this sample.

extracted_units.description: The unit of biological material that was extracted from this sample.

sample_amount.description: The amount of extracted sample shipped. Example: 400 ng
